item.description:
HELLO LOVELY LADIES!
I hope you like French food! So the unanimous vote was for restaurant 718... for 7pm on Monday. The Manager's name is Benni so if he says "what reservation for 9??" we'll know who to complain to...
I usually give out my cell for meet up events in case someone needs directions, so it is 413-627-3484.... If you want to send me yours that will be cool, just in case I get there late (lol). Please note the address and the important info below!
Thanks,

Please Note To:

2. Email me your selection by Friday 12noon!
3. Be absolutely certain that you are coming. There are no Last Minute Cancellations or No Shows permitted for this event as ladies who are on the waiting list will loose their chance of taking your space. If you absolutely must cancel please do so by Saturday afternoon by 12noon.

Directions can be found at their website:http://www.718restaur... or below:


Via Subway:

Take the "N” or “W" Queens/Uptown train
to Ditmars Blvd. to last stop.
Walk to Ditmars Blvd., make a right,
go 3 blocks. 718 Restaurant is on the
NorthEast corner of Ditmars and 35th Street.

Via Car:

From Queens and Long Island - GCP to 31st Street, Hoyt Avenue exit. Last exit before Triboro, Go North on 31st street. Make a right on Ditmars. Go 3 blocks to the corner of Ditmars and 35th Street. 718 will be on your left hand side.

718 Restaurant is on the NorthEast corner of Ditmars and 35th Street. There is street parking and Municipal Parking available on 33rd Street between Ditmars and 23rd Ave.

From Manhattan and New Jersey - Triboro Bridge – Exit 31st Street and Astoria Blvd exit. Take service road to east to 35th Street make a left on 35th street. Go straignt to Ditmars Blvd. 718 is on the right hand side

718 Restaurant is on the NorthEast corner of Ditmars and 35th Street. There is street parking and Municipal Parking available on 33rd Street between Ditmars and 23rd Ave.

718 Restaurant

For Reservations and Info


Call (718) 204-5553

FAX (718) 204 2507


Email: info@718restaurant.com
item.name: WE PICKED A PLACE! FOR QUEENS RESTAURANT WEEK!!
